title: Truth Gaming. (SA BASED)
body:
Hey there, Truth Gaming are looking for Adelaide based player for our LAN tournaments. We are looking for two of three roles. Top, Mid or Support.

Please contact me ONLY if you are Adelaide based.

replies.body:
Hi, I am interested and am Adelaide based.
IGN: YLOWR
Regards,
Hey, I am interested. IGN ninjapokemon72
